Package com.mc.helper

Class TimeUtils

java.lang.Object
com.mc.helper.TimeUtils
public abstract class TimeUtils extends Object
Utility class for converting and working with timestamps and time zones. Provides methods to convert between UTC, EST, and the system's local time zone. Also includes functionality to calculate durations and compare time differences.

    • convertToUtcTimestamp

      public static Timestamp convertToUtcTimestamp(LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Converts a LocalDate and LocalTime object to a UTC Timestamp.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDate object representing the date.
      time - The LocalTime object representing the time.
      Returns:
      The Timestamp object representing the date and time in UTC.

    • isWithinFifteenMinutes

      public static boolean isWithinFifteenMinutes(Timestamp appointmentTimestamp, Timestamp currentTimestamp)
      Checks if the difference between two timestamps is within 15 minutes.
      Parameters:
      appointmentTimestamp - The first Timestamp object.
      currentTimestamp - The second Timestamp object.
      Returns:
      true if the difference between the two timestamps is within 15 minutes, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      The LocalTime object representing the local time equivalent to the specified EST time.
